thread.title: ​LL Cool J's son arrested on trespass charge in NYC
thread.title_full: ​LL Cool J's son arrested on trespass charge in NYC - CBS News

author: Crimesider Staff AP
title: ​LL Cool J's son arrested on trespass charge in NYC
text:
NEW YORK -- Police say the 26-year-old son of actor and rapper LL Cool J has been arrested on a trespassing charge following a dispute at a New York City restaurant.
Police say officers who arrived were informed that Smith had gotten into a dispute and was asked to leave. The department says he became combative with restaurant security.
Police didn't say what the dispute was about.
It was unclear if Smith had a lawyer who could comment on the charges.
A call to LL Cool J's representative and an email message to his agent seeking comment weren't immediately returned Wednesday morning.
